description: This Java source file defines the 'Event' entity class for the event management backend. It represents a database entity with fields like id, name, description, startTime, endTime, and location, including validation constraints and JPA annotations.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: Entity class representing an event with properties such as id, name, description, startTime, endTime, and location. Includes constructors, getters, and setters.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Default constructor for the Event class.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for creating an Event instance with specified attributes.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the event.

methods.name: getStartTime
methods.description: Returns the start time of the event.

methods.name: getEndTime
methods.description: Returns the end time of the event.

methods.name: getLocation
methods.description: Returns the location of the event.

methods.name: setStartTime
methods.description: Sets the start time of the event.

methods.name: setEndTime
methods.description: Sets the end time of the event.

methods.name: setLocation
methods.description: Sets the location of the event.
